name: Cogwax
description:
Use arrow keys to move, and Z to undo. X to redo. C to enter "Time View"

Currently unfinished, but you can push blocks around, travel back and forth in time using Undo/Redo

Press C to enter "Time view" and see into the third dimension of time

bugs probably abound, sorry about that. final release was about three minutes before the jam ended

there's not much game to speak of, just the basic engine
